title: Corrie fans heap praise on 'phenomenal' Katie McGlynn for Sinead scenes
text:
Coronation Street fans are in a bit of a state tonight after a heartbreaking episode saw Sinead Tinker (Katie McGlynn) record a video for her baby son Bertie before she then found the strength to forgive Daniel Osbourne (Rob Mallard) for his infidelity with Bethany Platt (Lucy Fallon).

And actress Katie has come in for some serious praise – as have the show’s writers – for a script and performance which saw Sinead urge Bertie to be kind to everyone as that is what will change the world.

Powerful – and extremely relevant – words.

Unusually for a soap, almost the entire first half of the episode was a single shot scene showing Sinead recording the video from a bed. It’s very hard for a serial drama to hold attention at the best of times so for a scene of such length to captivate the UK in such a way was a big ask.

But captivate Katie did – as fans have been racing to social media to praise her. Although it sounds like we all need to top up on the tissues we have gone through tonight.

Oh my god #Corrie has well and truly hit me in the heart. @KatiexMcGlynn deserves every award going for her performance. My heart sincerely goes out to everyone in sinead’s situation❤️❤️❤️❤️ — Kirst-Lou✨💛💜 (@kirst_louisexxo) October 24, 2019

@KatiexMcGlynn @LisaGeorgeActor @andywhyment81 @Rob_Mallard outstanding performance from the actors, I’m sitting in floods of tears watching tonight’s episode of @itvcorrie lord help me tomorrow night #Corrie at its best — kelly carson (@kelly_tink1979) October 24, 2019

I'm 45. I'm pretty rational (I think!), and reasonably intelligent (I hope!). I can differentiate between a character and an actor. Why, then, am I weeping for #Sinead?

Possibly because this is the finest performance, and these are the most moving scenes in #Corrie's history. — John Hughes (@hughesjg) October 24, 2019

Such a powerful episode of #Corrie tonight #Sinead was incredible and heartfelt and it will be even harder as the week passes xxxxx well done to all concerned — Debbie (@xdebbiej23x) October 24, 2019

Such an emotional episode brilliantly portrayed by @KatiexMcGlynn so sincere. You just know she will be in so much more, such a talented actress will miss her in the street too #corrie — Dominic | D E A N 📸 (@ddphotograph) October 24, 2019

Tomorrow night sees an hour long episode devoted entirely to the Sinead storyline – and will capture her final hours as she passes away. They promise to be some of the most heartbreaking scenes in the soap’s history.

Meanwhile, Katie has thanked fans for their ongoing support over the storyline, tweeting: ‘Your beautiful messages mean everything..I wouldn’t be able to watch Sinead’s final days if it wasn’t for the support of every single one of you. I’m going to miss Sinead Tinker so much, but I am so humbled to hear we’re doing this storyline justice.’ (sic)

"The first time I set eyes on you it was like I was coming home"… 😢💔 Our hearts are breaking for Sinead and Daniel.#Corrie Visit: https://t.co/P5cXcT73S3 if you have been affected by Sinead's story. pic.twitter.com/GKb6AhLrVk — Coronation Street (@itvcorrie) October 24, 2019

Katie has been in the role for six years and the end of the storyline marks a devastating new journey for Daniel.
